title: Conglin Lixian
synopsis: There are five good friends living deep in the shade of the jungle. They are the elk with leadership qualities, the simple and lively panda, the martial arts big-headed bird, the catwoman obsessed with magic, and the delicate butterfly. Five good friends headed by Elk Manduo, in order to realize their life aspirations, go together to find the legendary water-marked mirror. What I didn't even think about was that the magic mirror they were fascinated by had long been in the hands of the fox and tiger, the pair of partners who had a bad heart for them. On the way to find the magic mirror, the fox and the tiger set up traps one after another to catch them, but the five partners marched forward for their dreams without fear. The traps often failed in front of their courage, and it was precisely because In this way, the enthusiasm of tigers and foxes who want to capture them is accompanied by failures.(translated form ibliili)
